title: Velcity /browse GUI broken by removal of old admin
description: The removal of old admin obviously removed webapp/web/admin including "solr_small.png" and "jquery-1.4.3.min.js", used by Velocity templates.

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content: More bugs related to removing old /admin

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content:
The logo is fixed, replaced with webapp/web/img/solr.png

What can we use to replace jquery-1.4.3.min.js

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content: Uppering to Critical since the velocity contrib actually is broken

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content: Fixed. Now autocomplete and the "toggle explain" and "toggle all fields" work again

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content: The Link to "Solr Admin" on the top right was still pointing to the old interface, which is no longer there
